commentBody:
A dose of reality is very badly needed here. Bannon is being described this way in the liberal echo chamber.

This relentless effort to discredit first Trump's supporters and now his associates was a wrongheaded policy that failed miserably and likely cost democrats' the election. It is still a highly problematic policy to pursue.

Somehow, however, the left just cannot seem to stop itself. Everyone on the far right is an enemy that must be viciously attacked. This sickness will destroy the Democratic Party if they don't get it under control.
